alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 6:00PM MDT until May 30 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 559 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northern Badlands National Park, or 40 miles west of Philip, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 542 a trained spotter reported golfball sized hail 5 miles north northeast of Scenic. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scenic, Delta 9 Missile Silo, Pinnacles Ranger Station and northeastern Badlands National Park. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 114 and 123. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
